text: agak, Nɨbi bɨ anɨb ak dad apɨl yɨp apɨm, Bɨ nɨm ak binɨb okok kɨlop takaw yepɨs agup apɨm agak. Agup, Gapman nop kɨdek ma gɨnɨmɨb agup apɨm. Pen mɨñɨl wɨdɨn mɨdup adek nɨbop ke dapɨl agebin ak agak. Tap tɨmel ogɨnap gek takaw awl yɨbɨl ak nɨŋɨjsek lɨl apɨm ak, jɨj anɨb ak ma pɨyow nepin agak.
